description: Spiked seltzers have been under the limelight lately, and for a good reason—they’re light, energizing, and low in calories.Truly Spiked Seltzer Mojito is a delicious twist on the&nbsp;Classic Mojito that’s mintier, citrusy, and more flavorful—perfect for summer sipping.
